start.text: Who's a man and a half? I'm a man and a half!
Lord almighty, I feel my temperature risin'!
Ooh, here it comes! Here comes the pain train!

start_boss.text: You are huge! That means you have huge guts!

out_of_missiles.text: My big gun is out of bullets!

engaged.text: Rip and tear rip and tear rip and tear your guts!
Might makes light! And I feel mighty!
Woo baby, I'm burning out of control!
The sugar-sweet kiss of heavy ordnance!

need_help.text: I need a big gun. I need a really big gun...
ARRRRGH! Turned my back... That was stupid!
You think you can get me?

pursuing.text: There's nothing wrong with you that I can't fix.... With my hands!
You're gonna be stupid and DEAD!

running.text: Feeling of invincibility over. Change of plans.

hull_90.text: Choo choo cha' boogie! Chooa choo cha...Choo ch...Choo cha...Oh my.

hull_50.text: My cause is just... My will is strong...
Now I'm radioactive! That can't be good!

hull_30.text: As I stride knee deep through the dead, all is clear. I know what must be done...
Ye, in my head I hear something that sounds like angels!

death.text: I have really had just about all I can't... Take...

victory.text: Who's the man? I'm the man!
I've blown up everything around here!

victory_boss.text: Righteousness and superior firepower has triumphed!
